title: Probable issue in diffdrive inbuilt plugin

content.raw:
Please run the following roslaunch command from the repo [https://github.com/OpenKnowledgeSharing/ROS_Getting_Started/tree/issue2575_diffdrive_gazebo9](Link URL) 


```
#!bash

source launchit
```
Above will set env, build and roslaunch it

do the /bot/cmd_vel turn for some time and stop and then either
go straight or reset and then go straight.

The bot after turn never goes straight.

Please let me know if this is valid bug. I will ask questions on the ROS Answer otherwise.


Video demonstration:
https://youtu.be/tScQ5WBcYOs
The description in the videos can be followed as well.
content.html:
Please run the following roslaunch command from the repo https://github.com/OpenKnowledgeSharing/ROS_Getting_Started/tree/issue2575_diffdrive_gazebo9 

source launchit

Above will set env, build and roslaunch it

do the /bot/cmd_vel turn for some time and stop and then either go straight or reset and then go straight.

The bot after turn never goes straight.

Please let me know if this is valid bug. I will ask questions on the ROS Answer otherwise.

Video demonstration: https://youtu.be/tScQ5WBcYOs The description in the videos can be followed as well.
